column4: this input --> sudo CFLAGS="-03" CXX=gcc CXXFLAGS="-03 -felide-constructors \ -fno-exceptions -fno-rtti" ./configure --prefix=/usr/local/mysql \ --enable-assembler --with-mysqld-ldflags=-all-static
gives this error --> sudo: CFLAGS=-03: command not found
put the CFLAGS and such before sudo?
